mapper.select: SELECT r.ID , r.ROLE_NAME, r.REMARK , r.CREATED_DATE , r.CREATED_BY , r.LAST_MODIFIED_DATE , r.LAST_MODIFIED_BY , r.MARK_DELETED , r.ROLE_CODE FROM B_MD_GIFT_ROLE r left join B_MD_GIFT_USER_TO_ROLE ur on r.ID = ur.ROLE_ID WHERE ur.USER_ID = #{userId} AND r.MARK_DELETED = 'N' AND ur.MARK_DELETED = 'N'
